summary: Use a blend of herbs and spices instead of salt!
descriptionHtml:
Poor Dovahkiin! Between Imperial soldiers, Stormcloaks, Dragons, Thalmor, Draugr and so many other stressors, it's no wonder the healer told him he has high blood pressure. And then he tells him to lay off the salt.
But that means no more Horker Loaf! NOOOO!

A Dash of Flavor seeks to replace the salt pile used in so many recipes with a blend of herbs and spices. They're not a secret, either. At any cooking pot, blend a garlic, lavender, frost mirram, and dried elves ear and you'll get 10 dashes of Herbs and Spices. This ingredient has replaced salt piles in several original recipes:

Cooked Meats: Beef, Chicken, Goat, Horker, Horse, Mammoth, Pheasant, Rabbit, Salmon, and Venison
Apple Cabbage Stew
Beef Stew (Also replaces Garlic with Potato)
Horker Stew (Replaces Garlic and Lavender)
Venison Stew
Tomato Soup (Also eliminates Garlic)
Cabbage Potato Soup

Hearthfires:
Potato Soup
Apple Pie
Chicken Dumplings

Dragonborn:
Cabbage Stew

This mod has an installer that will let you pick the mod that is right for you, whether you have Hearthfires, Dragonborn, or both.
Future plans: Sale by vendors, better model for Herbs and Spices
This is a simple mod and my first published one. Feel free to critique or offer advice.
Thanks to blasphemyblack and his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29751]Culinary Blasphemy[/url] for the inspiration.
